attributes.action: undertake an integrated program to tackle voilence and social anomie in children and young people, and to centralise Child Social Care Services in a single central goverment-run organisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recognition of the increasing problems of violence, murder and social alienation perpetrated and suffered by children and young people, we submit the following program:

1. The introduction of single national organisation for Child Social Care and an end to post code lotteries of care provision and local authority.
2. The introduction of new and better options for dealing with bad parenting, anti-social behaviour and child protection, including support for poor parents and criminal action against wilfully anti-social and abusive parenting.
3. A project to investigate the most effective individual and community rehabilitative initiatives to tackle violence and social anomie.
4. Legislative recognition of the right of approved adults (teachers, social care staff, etc) to use physical restraint in the face of violence and extreme oppositional behaviour.
5. Tougher sentencing of violent youth offenders and the provision of tightly controlled rehabilitative centres based on modern models of behaviour modification.
